search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Bannerbear (bannerbear.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Bannerbear can be found at: [https://www.bannerbear.com/pricing/](https://www.bannerbear.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Popular questions about Bannerbear

API
